The Roman Catholic Community is served by the Church of St. John the Evangelist at Herons Ghyll, which draws its congregation also from Nutley, Fairwarp and Buxted. Built in 1897 this little church originally had its own school attached to the Priest's house, but this is now closed Over 100 attend Sunday masses. There is an organist but no choir. The Church is funded mainly from the weekly collections and an endowed income of Â£l5OO p.a. and the Priest is semi-retired.
